TrackingCodeCustomizer.PluginDescription: The provided values will replace the defaults in the generated tracking code (leave blank to use defaults). Viewing https://github.com/piwik/piwik/blob/master/core/Tracker/TrackerCodeGenerator.php is recommended to deconstruct how the tracking code is built.
TrackingCodeCustomizer.idSiteSettingDescription: The siteId that will be included in the tracking code.
TrackingCodeCustomizer.httpsPiwikUrlSettingDescription: Set if the HTTPS domain is different from the normal domain.
TrackingCodeCustomizer.optionsSettingDescription: A string of JavaScript code that customizes the JavaScript tracker (after _paq = _paq || [] and before trackPageView).
TrackingCodeCustomizer.optionsBeforeTrackerUrlSettingDescriptio: A string of Javascript code that customizes the JavaScript tracker inside of anonymous function before adding setTrackerUrl into paq.
TrackingCodeCustomizer.piwikJsSettingDescription: Let's you customize the piwik.js Filename, don't forget to create a rewrite accordingly.
TrackingCodeCustomizer.piwikPhpSettingDescription: Let's you customize the piwik.php Filename, don't forget to create a rewrite accordingly.
TrackingCodeCustomizer.paqVariableSettingTitle: Name for _paq in Javascript tracking code
TrackingCodeCustomizer.paqVariableSettingDescription: Let's you customize the _paq JS Variable in your tracking code
TrackingCodeCustomizer.removePiwikBrandingSettingTitle: Remove PIWIK branking in tracking code
TrackingCodeCustomizer.removePiwikBrandingSettingDescription: Removed the name PIWIK out of the comments in the code
